package.name: expressiongraph_context
package.description: expressiongraph_context: Defines the context: the core data structure for task definitions (eTaSL). Defines a basic velocity resolved task controller (eTC). This repository does not contain any ROS dependencies, except for the build system. It also does not contain any dependencies on the scripting language. This repository contains a version of qpOASES. This repository also contains an iTaSC adaptor.
package.author: Erwin Aertbelien
Erwin Aertbelien
